revision.text: ===Shiny Pokémon=== {| class="wikitable" ! Name !! Description !! Bonus Percentage |- | I'd rather be shiny || Capture your first Shiny || +0.14% |- | These Pokémon must be sick || Capture 10 unique Shinies || +0.27% |- | Why Am I Doing This? || Capture 20 unique Shinies || +0.41% |- | Why Am I Still Doing This?! || Capture 30 unique Shinies || +0.54% |- | Okay fine, I can do a few more || Capture 40 unique Shinies || +0.68% |- | Where Did All The Shiny Pokémon Go? || Capture 50 unique Shinies || +1.35% |- | Nvm, found some more || Capture 75 unique Shinies || +2.03% |- | Just keep swimming just keep swimming -- oooo shiny! || Capture 100 unique Shinies || +2.71% |- | I don't know if I can handle the next batch of shinies. || Capture 151 unique Shinies || +6.77% |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
